about_the_game:
The Universe is corrupted. We are the only chance at cleansing it. Ship #404 is missing, which we must urgently find them. Their ShipType's Power CORE could fuel that corruption for eons at double the efficiency if we don't stop it. That's where you come in, #274. Your ShipType is durable enough to not immediately be ripped to shreds by the corrupted. So, to keep it brief; Save #404, stop the corruption, save space. We're all counting on you, #274.

Pellet Dodge is a simple, yet challenging game where you must save your friend from being used as fuel for the corrupted destruction of the Universe.

Features
- Fly and dash through over 40 levels and counting!
- Collect coins to upgrade your Ship
- Customize your ship with an almost endless amount of colors
- Make your own Custom Levels
- Survive for the longest time in Endless Mode, and submit your score to the Online Leaderboards

Pellet Dodge is a long-term project and the story is NOT fully finished yet! Later on, more story will be available and current storytelling will be improved.
What does this mean?
I was heavily encouraged to release my game when I did, so I did. The game's not in Early Access since the Base Game is at a state that I consider finished. I'm only planning to expand it later so that the story can be fluently experienced, rather than buying a sequel game.

This also means the price will increase when the game is finished.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: A 64-bit Linux distro.
  • Processor: A 64-bit processor, see Windows processor note above!)
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or Dedicated GPU that supports OpenGLCore.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PD defaults to Vulkan for performance and Steam Deck battery preservation, but can fallback to OpenGLCore automatically if your system doesn't support it. | File sizes and RAM usage may change from updates. *RAM usage is based off Windows testing.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or Dedicated GPU that supports Vulkan.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required for optional online leaderboards.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13+ (High Sierra) 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Apple Silicon or Intel Processor
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGLCore (May have artifacts; depricated by Unity)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: File sizes and RAM usage may change from updates. | *RAM usage is based on Windows testing.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Apple M1 Chip
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal API
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: A 64-bit processor. (Pretty much any CPU can run PD. If it can't, let me know!)
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or Dedicated GPU that supports OpenGL.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PD can run in Vulkan and OpenGL automatically if your system doesn't support DirectX11. | File sizes and RAM usage may change from updates.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated or Dedicated GPU that supports DirectX11 (See Additional Notes below.)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: internet is required for optional online leaderboards.
